>=

n

I a=
m with you there 100%.  But as a compromise, I have agree to set up 
Maven =
and Cactus to automatically perform in-container unit tests on 
those thin-=
layer EJB's until I can prove to the fellow in charge that 
it hurts more t=
han it helps (to unit test continuously, instead of

e end).

I suppose my question is... just how bad is this going to hurt? :)=
